oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dia!kwain provides the following: 'I beat my children, my body' on the 26 June 1872. 1) This story is found in Book XXV.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wilhelm Bleek notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences
